SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.robolectric.annotation
Annotation Type Config

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
public @interface Config

Indicate that robolectric should look for values that is specific by those qualifiers

Optional Element Summary
 int emulateSdk
          The Android SDK level to emulate.
 String manifest
          The Android manifest file to load; Robolectric will look relative to the current directory.
 String qualifiers
          Qualifiers for the resource resolution, such as "fr-normal-port-hdpi".
 int reportSdk
          The Android SDK level to report in Build.VERSION.SDK_INT.
 Class<?>[] shadows
          A list of shadow classes to enable, in addition to those that are already present.
 

emulateSdk

public abstract int emulateSdk
The Android SDK level to emulate. If not specified, Robolectric defaults to the targetSdkVersion in your app's manifest. Not yet supported as of Robolectric 2.0.

Default:
-1

manifest

public abstract String manifest
The Android manifest file to load; Robolectric will look relative to the current directory. Resources and assets will be loaded relative to the manifest. If not specified, Robolectric defaults to AndroidManifest.xml. If your project has no manifest or resources, use NONE.

Default:
"--default"

qualifiers

public abstract String qualifiers
Qualifiers for the resource resolution, such as "fr-normal-port-hdpi".

See Also:
Providing Resources in the Android Developer docs for more information.
Default:
""

reportSdk

public abstract int reportSdk
The Android SDK level to report in Build.VERSION.SDK_INT.

See Also:
Android Version History.
Default:
-1

shadows

public abstract Class<?>[] shadows
A list of shadow classes to enable, in addition to those that are already present.

Default:
{}
